name: Ke's Home - GitHub.io
body:
Welcome to Ke's home!

I am currently a senior year undergraduate student majoring in Electronic Information Engineering at University of Science and Technology of China (USTC), and my expected date of graduation is Jun. 2015. This year I will enroll in a Ph.D. program in Computer Science and Engineering at Ohio State University, USA. My future research area is Machine Perception, Neural Networks, Speech and Language Processing.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
